statements: SELECT * FROM financial_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT record_id, description FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM financial_records
SELECT record_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_records GROUP BY record_date
SELECT description, record_date FROM financial_records WHERE record_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM financial_records ORDER BY record_date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT record_id, description FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 1000 LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM financial_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT record_id, amount, description FROM financial_records WHERE description LIKE '%tax%' OR description LIKE '%refund%'
SELECT * FROM financial_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01' AND record_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_id, category FROM childcare_expenses ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_records WHERE description LIKE '%food%';
SELECT record_id, amount FROM financial_records WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT record_id, record_date, description, amount FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT record_id, record_date, description, amount FROM financial_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY record_id ASC
SELECT * FROM childcare_expenses WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY expense_date ASC
SELECT expense_id, category, amount FROM childcare_expenses WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY amount DESC, expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_records fr JOIN childcare_expenses ce ON fr.amount = ce.amount WHERE fr.record_date > '2022-07-01' ORDER BY fr.record_date ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_records ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT amount, description FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 1000

SELECT date, amount FROM support_payments WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT id, date, amount, description FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM childcare_expenses WHERE child_name = 'Alice' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 3

SELECT id, date, amount, notes FROM childcare_expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_records;
SELECT record_id, record_date, amount FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, amount FROM childcare_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM support_payments WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY payment_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT description, date, amount FROM financial_records ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT recipient_name, amount FROM support_payments WHERE support_type = 'Child Support'
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses_childcare WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payer_name = 'John Doe'

SELECT * FROM expenses_childcare WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_records WHERE description LIKE '%tax%'
SELECT * FROM support_payments WHERE recipient_name = 'Alice' AND support_type = 'Child Support'
SELECT payer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_history GROUP BY payer_name HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
